Part 1. Functional Forms and Marginal Abatement Cost
```{r}
#Explore the data

plota <- ggplot(mcca, aes(x = Abatement, y = MC_A ))+ #concave? log - asymptotic?
  geom_point()
plota

plotb <- ggplot(mcca, aes(x = Abatement, y = MC_B ))+ #concave? log - asymptotic?
  geom_point()
plotb

plotc <- ggplot(mcca, aes(x = Abatement, y = MC_C ))+ #exponential, convex, y = x^2
  geom_point()
plotc

plotd <- ggplot(mcca, aes(x = Abatement, y = MC_D ))+ 
  geom_point() #stepwise? looks like one slope from 0-100, then another from 100 - 150
plotd

```
